galla, mathara, hambanthota yana disthrikkawala pawul saukhya sewa niladhariniyan 1080k pradeshiya saukhya niladhari karyala yatathe sewaye yedena athara rohalwala 264denaku sewaye yedi sitithi.rajaye heda hediyanta nila andum dimanawak washayen ru.14000k gewanu labuwath pawul saukhya anshaye ayata gewanu labanne ru.13500ki.me thaththwaya kanagatudayaka bawath samana sewa sapayana pawul saukhya sewa anshayata adu salakillak dakwana bawath ema mudalin da owunta gewa aththe pasu giya marthu watupa samaga ru.6750k bawath ema mudala ho ekawara gewa nomathi bawath dakunu palath saukhya sewa niladharinge sangamaya pawasayi.

eheth kisiwekuth nowimasana prashnaya wanne sandhanawala swabhawaya eya nam nawathath sandhana sadanne umathuwakin da yannayi. 1994 di chandrika wiktar ayiwan sandhanaya awasan wimata sanath gunathilaka nam sadhakaya hethu wiya. 2005 di janatha wimukthi peramuna ha mahinda rajapaksha athara sandhanaya ahosi wimata sandhanaya sambandhikaranaya karamin siti wimal wirawansha namathi sadhakaya hethu wiya. 2015 di warthamana aanduwa ha sadharana samajayak sandaha wu sanwidhanaya samanga sandhanaya ahosi wimata gajamithuran namathi sadhakaya hethu wiya.
